question: The Juvenile Justice Act, 2015 was approved recently, after the proposal of which Union Ministry?
option1: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare
option2: Ministry of Women and Child Development
answer: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation:
The Union Cabinet on Wednesday approved a set of amendments to the Juvenile Justice (Care and Protection of Children) Act, 2015.
This was the proposal of the Ministry of Women and Child Development. The amendments include empowering the District Magistrates (DM) and the additional DMs to monitor the functioning of agencies, which are implementing the act.
